name: Voodoo Boys
description: The Voodoo Boys do not call themselves by that name. It was given to them by others based on superficial similarities to an early twenty-first century gang of drug dealers. For this original gang, the "voodoo" stuff was just a pose, a lark. For the 2077 gang, their religion is a deadly serious matter.Description The Voodoo Boys (real name unknown) are a gang operating in Night City. What in the 2070s was known as the Voodoo Boys originate from Haiti. In 2062, climate change wiped Haiti off...
